entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
